name: Shapeshifter (Cornealeus)
description:
This Is a short game I made in a few hours for Ludum Dare. http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=87568

I hadn't planned to enter at all, but changed my mind at the last minute. I might add more, I might not.

This is my first Twine game.
